page.title: 10Before School
page.content: I get up at 8.00am. I usually have cornflakes for my{BREAKFAST}followed by toast and coffee. Our house is about 3 minutes walk from school and if I leave at 8.40am., I might go to Mitchell's{STORES}where I buy some crisps. They also sell magazines, newspapers and all kinds of{GROCERIES. I usually get to school about 15 minutes before 9.00am. and in the summer time we play marbles before the school bell goes. In our{MARBLES}games we make shallow saucer shaped hollows in the ground which we call the pot. You throw the marble as close to the pot as you can get it. Then the other person throws his marble and if it goes nearer or in the pot that means they go first and try to pot both marbles. The person who has the best shot will win all the marbles on the ground or in the pot.
